name: Thesis Template
tagline: BSc Thesis Template, University of Zanjan
body:
### Welcome to Thesis Template Page.
This is a thesis template in Persian for BSc students of university of Zanjan.

Do you have any suggestions? You are welcome to send me your suggestions and comments at `rahmanidashti@gmail.com`

### Typesetting
  [LaTex](https://www.latex-project.org/)

  [XePersian](https://www.ctan.org/pkg/xepersian?lang=en)

### Authors and Contributors
Saeed Rahmani (@rahmanidashti)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with template? Check out LaTex's [documentation](https://latex-project.org/guides/) or make your questions in [LaTex Stack Exchange](http://tex.stackexchange.com/) and you can check out and make question in Persian with [Wiki Parsi Latex](http://www.parsilatex.com/wiki/%D8%B5%D9%81%D8%AD%D9%87%D9%94_%D8%A7%D8%B5%D9%84%DB%8C) and [Parsi LaTex Forum](http://qa.parsilatex.com/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
